full_description:
DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Axis Gimbal Stabilizer Action Camera

The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera adds a 1/1.7" 64MP CMOS sensor, up to 8x zoom, a 93Â° angle of view, and four directional stereo microphones with DJI Matrix Stereo audio zoom to its predecessor, employing its lightweight, ultra-compact 3-axis gimbal stabilizer and 4K camera combo. New software additions include an upgraded ActiveTrack 3.0, built-in glamour effects, an AI editor, Hybrid AF 2.0, and motion-lapse, all without the need for a smartphone app. It includes everything you'll need for a high-resolution mobile production to make family films, add footage to photo sessions or vlog your latest streaming masterpieces with smooth motion video.

Pocket-Sized and Creator Combo

The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera is a pocket-sized and incredibly portable camera that allows you to film unforgettable events on your own. It can steady movement, capture excellent photographs, and record smooth movies. A wide-angle lens, a "Do-it-All" handle, a USB Type-A to Type-C splitter, a wireless microphone transmitter, and a mini tripod are all included in the Creator Combo.

High-Definition Panorama and ActiveTrack 3.0

The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera Get a 180Â° panorama of the entire mountain range or a 3x3 panoramic of everyone in a group selfie. With ActiveTrack 3.0, Pocket 2 keeps you and your buddies in the shot no matter how you move.

Story Mode and Time-Lapse

The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera Story mode employs video and audio templates to create thrilling mini-movies in a matter of seconds. Time-lapse photography allows you to compress hours into seconds. Motion-lapse incorporates smooth camera movement. Hyper-lapse photography allows you to journey through time.

AI Editor and Motorized Stabilization

Not interested in editing? AI Editor blends your video with transitions and music to produce shareable content. Glamour effects, an AI editor, and narrative mode software are all included.

Hollywood-Quality Smoothness and Image Quality

The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera 3-axis motorized gimbal is what permits this little camera to provide large-screen effects. The Pocket 2 has a 1/1.7" sensor, can take up to 64MP images, can shoot video at up to 4K60, and has Hybrid AF 2.0.

HDR Video and 8x Zoom

The DJI Pocket 2 Creator Combo 3 Action Camera is a 3-in-1 action camera. A good life is full of color, so let it all shine. DJI Pocket 2 uses HDR video to split exposure settings by location and overlay the image so that the film bursts with life-like realism. Looking for attention to detail? The stabilized camera captures excellent 8x zoom stills while capturing 64MP images, up to 4x zoom on 1080p video, and up to 2x zoom on 4K video. It has no warranty.

title: DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal with 3-Axis Stabilization
cat_seo_title: DJI Gimbal Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy DJI Gimbal at competitive price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal with 3-Axis Stabilization

The DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal stabilizer enhances stability and enables you to move your footage more creatively by having a smaller form factor and a longer battery life than its predecessor. More shooting modes and features are available when using the DJI Mimo app thanks to the improved Bluetooth 5.1 connection. The OM Magnetic Phone Clamp 3 is another feature of the SE that enables the rig to support cellphones up to 3.3" broad. The gimbal can support weights up to 10.2 oz overall. A grip tripod, power cord, and storage pouch are all included with the gimbal so you can take it with you wherever you go.

ActiveTrack 5.0

The DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal Upgraded ActiveTrack 5.0 enhances stability over greater distances and supports front camera tracking from both side orientations and while spinning. Built-in 3-axis gimbal motors produce smooth video even when they are operating with lossless delivery.

Timelapse, Motion lapse, Hyperlapse

The DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal With the grip tripod, place your gimbal on a level surface and start a timelapse of the view of your choice. During your timelapse, use Motionlapse to pre-set a gimbal path for subtle, dynamic movement. Using hyper-lapse, you may quickly and steadily capture motion. You may make compilation videos using the DJI Mimo app's templates by selecting footage to emphasize.

Gimbal Modes

This Gimbal modes refer to the different settings available on a camera gimbal that control its movement and orientation while shooting. One of the most common modes is the "Follow" mode, in which the camera view follows the gimbal's pan and tilt movements while remaining stable during rolls. This mode is useful for capturing smooth, steady footage while tracking a subject's movement. Another popular mode is "Tilt Locked," which allows the camera view to only follow the gimbal's pan movement while remaining stable during tilts and rolls. This mode is useful when filming a subject that is stationary or when the camera needs to stay level while the gimbal moves. The "FPV" mode is a more advanced setting that allows all three axes of the gimbal to follow the movement of the main body. This mode is commonly used in drone or action camera footage, where the camera needs to follow the movement of the user. The "SpinShot" mode allows the user to control the rotation of the gimbal by pushing the joystick left or right. This mode is useful when filming panoramic shots or when the user wants to add a dynamic element to their footage. Compact and Portable. Fold the Mobile SE down to a compact form factor capable of fitting in your pocket. Its magnetic phone clamp easily detaches when not in use and is capable of fitting around your phone while in its case.

Bluetooth 5.1 for Remote Control

The DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal Integrated Bluetooth 5.1 connectivity allows you to control your gimbal from your smartphone with the DJI Mimo app. Tutorials provide intuitive instructions and guides to execute your creative vision. Toggle between modes like Timelapse, Dynamic Zoom, and Panorama. When touching your screen or controls is inefficient, Gesture Control has your back for easy group photos or selfies. Once finished, LightCut can help you edit your videos or photos with embedded AI-powered templates.

Onboard Control

The DJI Osmo Mobile SE Smartphone Gimbal's straightforward, easy-to-reach controls let you control all three axes while holding the gimbal. You may check the gimbal mode, system status indicator, and battery level using the built-in status screen. The mode button alternates among the four gimbal modes. Adjustments are made quickly at a maximum control speed of 120°/s. At the push of a button, switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

DJI RS 3 Mini Gimbal Stabilizer

The DJI RS 3 Mini Gimbal Stabilizer is a compact and versatile stabilization device designed for mirrorless cameras. It features a 1.4" full-color OLED touchscreen that allows for easy control and navigation of settings. With its lightweight design weighing in at just 795g (1.75 lbs), it is incredibly portable and suitable for on-the-go shooting. Equipped with the 3rd-Gen RS Stabilization Algorithm, the RS 3 Mini ensures smooth and steady footage, minimizing camera shakes and vibrations. It supports the A7 + 24-70mm F2.8 GM lens, providing compatibility with popular mirrorless camera setups. The gimbal stabilizer can handle a maximum payload of up to 4.4 lbs, allowing for a wide range of camera and lens combinations. It offers wireless camera control via Bluetooth, enabling convenient adjustments and settings changes remotely. The DJI RS 3 Mini Gimbal Stabilizer offers both horizontal and vertical shooting modes, giving users flexibility and creative freedom. It features panorama, timelapse, and tracking functions, allowing for dynamic and engaging shots. The built-in 2450mAh battery provides a runtime of up to 10 hours, ensuring extended usage without frequent recharging. The gimbal stabilizer is equipped with a NATO rail that enables the attachment of handles and various accessories, enhancing the overall shooting experience. Whether you're capturing professional footage or documenting your adventures, the DJI RS 3 Mini Gimbal Stabilizer offers stability, control, and a host of creative features to elevate your videography.

Featuring a 1" OLED screen, the RSC 2 provides a clear and intuitive interface for easy control and monitoring of your settings. This advanced algorithm combines with powerful motors to provide smooth and responsive stabilization performance. The RSC 2 also includes a built-in focus dial, allowing you to make quick and precise focus adjustments without the need for additional equipment. Additionally, the SuperSmooth feature enhances stability when using long lenses, ensuring smooth tracking shots and minimizing camera shake. This gimbal stabilizer offers both standard and portrait modes, giving you the flexibility to capture footage in various orientations. Furthermore, it boasts creative functions like Roll 360, enabling you to achieve stunning cinematic effects with seamless camera movements. The DJI RSC 2 Gimbal Stabilizer Pro Combo is a professional-grade camera stabilizer that combines advanced stabilization technology, a versatile design, and a range of creative features. full_description:
DJI RS 3 Pro Gimbal Stabilizer

The DJI RS 3 Pro Gimbal Stabilizer surpasses the RS 2 gimbal in terms of power. Its body is crafted from carbon silver, weighing in at 3.3 pounds. It has the capacity to support up to 10 pounds of weight, enabling effortless handling of setups such as the Sony FX6 or Canon C70 with a 24-70mm zoom lens attached. The gimbal's arms are meticulously constructed using layers of uncut carbon fiber, resulting in its lightweight nature and facilitating smooth shooting experiences. Additionally, this gimbal features a precision adjustment knob, further enhancing its versatility as a camera accessory.

Automated Axis Locks

This DJI RS 3 Pro Gimbal allows you to work within 2 seconds by simply pressing and holding the power button. The three axes unlock and the gimbal expands automatically. After finishing your work, you can automatically lock the axes and turn them into sleep mode just by pressing the power button within a moment.

Wireless Shutter Control

This functionality makes it feasible to use mirror control mode and to provide seamless wireless control from wherever on set. You may control the primary menu features of the Sonny mirrorless camera by using the DJI RS 3 Pro's camera control features. The camera doesn't need to be removed from its mount. In this gimbal, a gyroscopic sensor may be used to turn on the remote monitor without the use of any additional gear. This functionality enables you to create more complex camera movement when driving or utilizing a jib.

Enhanced Battery and Fast Charging

DJI RS 3 Pro's new battery grip provides up to 12-hour runtime. So you can continuously shoot all day long. It needs only 2.5 hours of charging time as it supports 18W PD fast charging.

Large 1.8" OLED Touchscreen

The DJI RS 3 Pro has 1.8 inches OLED full-color touchscreen. It gives a 28% larger display than RS 2. This OLED screen offers higher brightness than the LCD screen with low power consumption.

Third-Gen RS Stabilization Algorithm

The DJI RS 3 Pro employs a third-generation RS stabilization algorithm, delivering 20% enhanced stability compared to its predecessor. This enables seamless handling of low-angle shots, running sequences, and various high and low positions.

title: DJI RSC 2 3-Axis Gimbal Stabilizer
cat_seo_title: DJI Gimbal Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy DJI Gimbal at competitive price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
DJI RSC 2 3-Axis Gimbal Stabilizer

The DJI RSC 2 3-Axis Gimbal Stabilizer is intended for mirrorless and DSLR cameras and can manage the camera and accessory weights of up to 3kg. The motors in the RSC 2 are 50% more powerful than those in the Ronin-SC, which is the gimbal's predecessor. The RSC 2 has a folding construction that allows it to be used in underslung mode.

Integrated grip handle with built-in 14-hour batteries

The gimbal head folds down from the gimbal handle, allowing you to utilize the gimbal underslung for low-angle pictures without having to connect or detach anything. The gimbal handle stays integrated and features built-in batteries with a runtime of up to 14 hours. Furthermore, the batteries may be charged via the handle while the gimbal is in use (unless in extremely hot/cold climates). The handle supports the PD and QC 2.0 fast-charging protocols and can be recharged in around two hours using an 18W fast charger, which is not supplied. The gimbal's folding form makes it easy to travel and store.

1" OLED black-and-white display

The RSC 2 also incorporates a 1" OLED black-and-white screen and a horizontal dial on the front for adjusting focus with the same hand that holds the gimbal. A NATO mount with M4 threads is located on either side of the gimbal handle for adding specific accessories such as an optional suitcase handle.

DJI Titan stabilization algorithm

The DJI Titan stabilization algorithm is used by the RSC 2, which is an enhanced version of their previous one that gives superior stability and fluidity. When dealing with up to 100mm zoom lenses, the algorithm is supplemented with a built-in function dubbed SuperSmooth. To provide smooth motion with long lenses, SuperSmooth adjusts for micromovements and boosts torque.

iOS 11+/Android 7.0+ companion app & Creative Functions Such as Roll 360

The gimbal is equipped with a dual-layer Manfrotto plus Arca-Swiss camera mounting system and two detachable fast-release plates. A single button press puts your camera in portrait mode for social media material. The RSC 2 has six possible setups and comes with an iOS/Android app that gives you access to functions like time-lapse, panoramic, and Roll 360, which spins your camera constantly along the roll axis. The gimbal also works with the optional DJI RavenEye transmission device, which enables remote 1080p video transmission, ActiveTrack 3.0 subject tracking from the gimbal, and other features.

The RSC 2 comes with a tiny tripod that attaches to a 1/4"-20 thread on the bottom of the grip handle and may be used as a stand or an extension handle for two-handed gimbal manipulation for specific shots. Camera control cables are also supplied, allowing specific cameras and functionalities to be controlled directly from the gimbal controls. It has no warranty.

DJI RS 3 Gimbal Stabilizer

The DJI RS 3 Gimbal Stabilizer is a cutting-edge camera accessory designed to provide smooth and stable footage for professional filmmakers and videographers. Boasting a lightweight design, the gimbal is highly portable and easy to carry around, making it an excellent choice for on-the-go shooting. The DJI RS 3 is its impressive 3kg payload capacity, which allows it to support popular camera models like the Sony a7S III and Canon R5. This high payload capacity ensures that filmmakers can mount their preferred cameras with ease and capture high-quality footage without any worries about stability. Navigating through the gimbal's settings and functions is made effortless with the inclusion of an advanced 1.8" OLED touchscreen. Users can easily access various controls and settings, facilitating quick adjustments and mode switching on the fly. The Instant Mode Switching feature is particularly handy for filmmakers who need to adapt swiftly to different shooting scenarios. With a simple tap or click, the gimbal can switch between various modes, ensuring that users can capture the perfect shot without any delays. For seamless and convenient transmission of images and footage, the DJI RS 3 supports a wireless image transmitter. This feature enables filmmakers to review their shots in real-time on a connected device, providing instant feedback and enhancing the overall shooting experience. The gimbal offers motion control functionality when paired with a smartphone. This allows users to execute precise camera movements remotely, offering creative possibilities and dynamic shots without the need for complex rigging or additional equipment. Filmmakers will appreciate the extended 12-hour operation time of the DJI RS 3, ensuring that they can capture all the desired footage throughout their shooting sessions. The PD fast charging capability further minimizes downtime and keeps users ready for action. Fine-tuning the gimbal's performance is made easier with the inclusion of a dedicated knob on the tilt axis. This fine-tuning option allows users to adjust the gimbal's tilt angle with precision, ensuring optimal balance and stability for different camera setups. It also offers creative functions such as "Time Tunnel," adding an artistic touch to the footage. This feature creates captivating visual effects that can elevate the overall production value of the videos. The DJI RS 3 Gimbal Stabilizer is a feature-packed and versatile tool that empowers filmmakers and videographers to unleash their creativity and capture stunning, stable footage with ease. Its lightweight design, high payload capacity, advanced controls, and creative functions make it a valuable addition to any filmmaker's toolkit.

title: DJI RS 2 Gimbal Stabilizer Pro Combo
cat_seo_title: DJI Gimbal Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy DJI Gimbal at competitive price in Bangladesh. Order online or visit your nearest Star Tech branch
full_description:
DJI RS 2 Gimbal Stabilizer Pro Combo

DJI RS 2 Gimbal Stabilizer Pro Combo is a redesigned follow-up to the Ronin-S gimbal with a payload of up to 10 lb. It's about 25% lighter and more compact thanks to monocoque carbon fiber axis arms and a shorter grip handle with a smaller battery cartridge, although still with a 12-hour runtime. The motors are about 20% more powerful and support cameras such as the Blackmagic Pocket 6K, Canon 1D X Mark III, Sony a7S III, and ALEXA Mini LF. The RS 2 also has a 1.4" full-color LCD touchscreen that allows you to access gimbal settings as well as features such as time-lapse and hyperlapse, which were previously accessible only via the companion mobile app. The RS 2 uses the DJI Titan stabilization algorithm to provide improved stabilization with increased smoothness. In applications with up to 100mm zoom lenses, a built-in feature called SuperSmooth complements the algorithm by compensating for micromovements and increasing torque to achieve fluid motion (an optional lens support is required). The RS 2 comes with a splash-proof carry case designed with dedicated compartments for the different parts of the gimbal and key accessories. A mini tripod is also included and attaches to a 1/4"-20 thread on the bottom of the grip handle to function as a stand or an extension handle for two-handed maneuvering of the gimbal in certain scenarios. This DJI RS 2 Gimbal Stabilizer Pro Combo has no warranty.
